overview:
An avid blogger based out of Santa Barbara, California, Mike Nolls is trying to spread his years of internet marketing experience to the masses, for free! No more marketing BS and sales copies, truthful and useful SEO information from the best SEO blog on the planet!

Outside of my daily work as an SEO consultant, I love surfing and sportbike riding. Every weekend, if there’s any swell, I spend a lot of time surfing Rincon, El Capitan, and various spots between Ventura and Point Conception. There has never been a sport or any activity that is as fulfilling to my mind and soul as surfing, it is the love of my life and I will never give it up. If your ever in the SB area, send me an email and I can give you some hints on good spots for west or northwest swells.
